pullrequest.title: undo redo added to edit menu and re arranged it

content.raw:
Thanks. 

I'm torn. Edit does seem like a good place for edits that will directly impact the render window. On the one hand, editing a model impacts the render window. On the other hand, the process for editing the model is far more complex, and in a different mode, when compared to simply Undo-ing.  

I could see the Model and Terrain Editors being similar enough to Plotting (because they are entirely separate windows) that they go under Window.
